text: Peace is when time doesn't matter as it passes by.
author: Maria Schell

text: You don't have to have fought in a war to love peace.
author: Geraldine Ferraro

text: The business of peace requires more than showing up with paint brushes, foodstuffs and an oil pipeline or two.
author: Tony Snow

text: This enemy of peace in the world today is unlike any we have seen in the past, and our military is learning from, and building on, previous successes while carrying peace and freedom into the future.
author: Mark Kennedy
